text: Piotr Przydział (born 15 May 1974) is a Polish former racing cyclist. He won the Tour de Pologne 2000. He also rode in the men's road race at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==Major results== ;1994 : 1st Overall Tour of Małopolska ;1998 : 1st 20px National Time Trial Championships ;1999 : 1st Stage 8 Volta a Portugal : 1st Stage 8 Peace Race : 2nd National Road Race Championships ;2000 : 1st Overall Tour de Pologne : 2nd Overall Szlakiem Grodów Piastowskich : 2nd Overall Peace Race ;2001 : 1st 20px National Time Trial Championships : 1st Majowy Wyścig Klasyczny–Lublin : 1st Overall Bałtyk-Karkonosze Tour : 3rd Overall Course de la Solidarité Olympique : 3rd Overall Tour of Małopolska ::1st Stages 2 & 4 : 3rd Overall Tour de Pologne ;2002 : 1st Stages 4 & 10 Peace Race ;2003 : 1st 20px National Road Race Championships ;2004 : 1st Overall Szlakiem Grodów Piastowskich ::1st Stage 4 : 1st Majowy Wyścig Klasyczny–Lublin ;2005 : 1st Grand Prix Kooperativa : 3rd Overall Szlakiem Grodów Piastowskich ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:People from Ropczyce-Sędziszów County Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Poland Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Podkarpackie Voivodeship
title: Piotr Przydział
